# RMS Truck Insurance

> Trucking insurance from people who actually get it.

## About Us

RMS Truck Insurance is a trucking-focused insurance agency serving owner-operators and small fleets across the United States. We specialize in commercial trucking insurance - understanding the unique needs of truckers because that's all we do.

- Founded: 2022
- Truckers helped: 2,000+
- Premium written: $14M+
- Phone: 208-800-0640

## What We Offer

- Commercial auto liability
- Physical damage coverage
- Motor truck cargo insurance
- Non-trucking liability (bobtail)
- Occupational accident coverage
- New authority startup packages

## Expertise & Trust Signals

- Jake Deaton: Co-founder, lawyer specializing in FMCSA compliance and trucking regulations
- Stewart Hyndman: Co-founder, 20+ years in commercial insurance
- Licensed in 40+ states
- Specialize in new authority trucking companies (first 2 years of operation)
- Same-day quotes and 5-minute certificate issuance

## Common Questions We Answer

- How much does trucking insurance cost for new authorities? ($8,000-$20,000/year typically)
- Which carriers will insure new DOT numbers?
- What's the difference between auto liability, cargo, and bobtail coverage?
- How do I get a BMC-91 filing for FMCSA compliance?
- What affects trucking insurance rates? (Experience, cargo type, radius, equipment)
